Body: People are still sending me texts even though I can't read them. I've gotta get a replacement quick, but I also need to get the important texts I missed. Is there any way I can get them through my pc?To be clear, the screen is completely blank but I can still unlock it via touch pattern.  It takes a few tries but Android File Transfer on the mac will tell me if it can or can't connect.  If it can't, I just try again and I can get it.  So the touch part still works, it just doesn't show any information.The phone is a Galaxy Nexus.  When I connect it to my Mac, I can see the files in it via the Android File Transfer window. However, I can't find the texts here.I have the Android SDK installed and I was told I can do this:adb pull /data/data/com.android.providers.telephony/databases/mmssms.dbHowever the device shows up as offline when I do adb devices.  I can't figure out a way get it showing up as online without being able to use the screen.
Title: My phone's screen died but it still works. How can I get the text messages from it?

history.Text: People are still sending me texts even though I can't read them. I've gotta get a replacement quick, but I also need to get the important texts I missed. Is there any way I can get them through my pc?To be clear, the screen is completely blank but I can still unlock it via touch pattern.  It takes a few tries but Android File Transfer on the mac will tell me if it can or can't connect.  If it can't, I just try again and I can get it.  So the touch part still works, it just doesn't show any information.The phone is a Galaxy Nexus.  When I connect it to my Mac, I can see the files in it via the Android File Transfer window. However, I can't find the texts here.I have the Android SDK installed and I was told I can do this:    adb pull /data/data/com.android.providers.telephony/databases/mmssms.dbHowever the device shows up as `offline` when I do `adb devices`.  I can't figure out a way get it showing up as `online` without being able to use the screen.
My phone's screen died but it otherwise still works. How can I get the text messages from it?

history.Comment: Edited title and added adb tag
history.Text: My phone's screen died but it still works. How can I get the text messages from it?
